name: Rickhouse Tropic
preparation:
Combine all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 8 seconds.
Remove ice and re-shake the cocktail for 8 seconds.
Double-strain into a chilled coupe, allowing the head of the cocktail to settle for about 3 seconds.
Using an atomizer, spray Angostura over half of the cocktail and garnish with an edible flower.
